project_descr: Support to Adaptation of Syrian Women Living in Southeast Anatolia to Social and Economic Life

outputs.output_descr: Mitigating the impact of Syrian Crisis on Southeast Anatolia. The output aims to offer long term solutions to address the coping capacities of local central actors hence contribute to the stabilized livelihoods and improvement of basic living conditions

Mitigating the impact of Syrian Crisis on Southeast Anatoia will address the pressing issue of waste management capacity of local authorities which is under severe pressure due to the Syrian population influx.
donor_name: US DEPARTMENT OF STATE - Bureau of Population, Refugees and Migration

outputs.output_descr: The Project aims at establishing partnerships between Turkish and Syrian NGOs to support coail and economic empowerment of the Syrian women who are beneficiaries of these organizations. This intervention will build on UNDP's experience in the topic.
